m_szDocTitle: Tesla Model X Trumps Porsche Cayenne Turbo In 0-60 MPH | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Model X Trumps Porsche Cayenne Turbo In 0-60 MPH Originally published on EV Obsession . While it’s easy to focus entirely on the Model X’s falcon-wing doors , or on its “bioweapon defense mode, ” or on its impressive panoramic windshield , that would mean not paying any attention to the (certainly not boring) basic specs — and the Model X really shines in that regard as well, so perhaps we should shine more light on those? On that note… it’s really something to to see just how substantially the Tesla Model X outperforms what had previously been (arguably) the most impressive vehicle in t
